description: Triangular array T read by rows: T(h,k)=number of binary words of k 1's and h-k 0's which are not a juxtaposition of 2 or more identical subwords.
links: Index entries for triangles and arrays related to Pascal's triangle
formula: MOEBIUS transform of A007318 Pascal's Triangle.
crossrefs: Same triangle as A053727 except this one includes column 0.
T(2n, n), T(2n+1, n) match A007727, A001700, respectively. Row sums match A027375.
author: _Clark Kimberling_
